highlight-modal.body: Would you like to highlight the {name} product? By putting it forward, it will be accessible via the command !shop on your Discord server, and will be displayed first in your shop ({serverId}). You can turn off the focus of your product by returning to this menu.

delete-modal.body: Be careful, this action is irreversible. Any confirmation will result in the deletion of all data associated with this server. Are you sure?

delete.subtitle: Once the server is deleted, it will be impossible to retrieve transactions, products, and other information.

features.description: No bank information passes through our accounts. Payment is made from the user's account to your PayPal account directly. And as a bonus, bank cards are accepted!
features.name: Secure

features.description: We do not take any additional charges. You will only pay the service charges incurred by the use of Paypal.
features.name: No Hidden Fees

features.description: As soon as the payment is made, the user receives his role directly on your server.
features.name: Instant Payment

features.description: The player receives an alert by private message as soon as their role has expired, inviting them to renew the player. No more forgetfulness of possible!
features.name: Expiration Alert
